pr_title: Adding support for isQuorum and qip714block options in genesis

timeline.message:
Adding support for isQuorum and qip714block options in genesis

Signed-off-by: Lucas Saldanha <lucascrsaldanha@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: When Besu is not in Quorum mode, we won't add isQuorum: false to the map 'cause it will end up as an unnecessary key in the json-rpc admin response. Does this make sense or should we add it anyway?
timeline.author: lucassaldanha

replies.bodyText: I don't think we need to know about it unless it is true
replies.author: macfarla
